segments.text: I'm afraid we're really staffed this week , Mr . Li . I'd like to meet you , but I'm sorry I really can't .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you telling me you're not going to meet with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all , sir . I'd just like to delay our meeting to next week , I'll have time at the beginning of next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't like it , but I guess I don't have any choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about Monday morning at 9 a . m . ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'll go to your office at that time .
segments.speaker: S2
